import React from 'react'
import {Switch, Route} from 'react-router-dom'
import AuthPage from '../pages/AuthPage'
import {connect} from 'react-redux'
import TestPage from '../pages/TestPage'
import HomePage from '../pages/Homepage'

const RouteViews = ({auth}) => (<main>
    <Switch>
        <Route exact path = "/" element={<HomePage/>}/>
        <Route exact path="/login" element={<AuthPage authType = "login" isAuthinticated={auth.isAuthinticated}/>} />
        <Route exact path="/register" element={<AuthPage authType = "register" isAuthinticated={auth.isAuthinticated}/>} />
        <Route exact path="/test" element={<TestPage/>} />
    </Switch>
</main>)

export default connect(store => ({auth : store.auth}))(RouteViews)
